property.value: Plot

property.name: Text
property.value: Kingdom. When revealed, if you have 1 or fewer Kingdom plot cards in your used pile, search your deck for up to 2 non-unique Wildling characters, with combined printed cost of 6 or lower, and put them into play. Then shuffle your deck

property.name: Type
property.value: Agenda

property.name: Text
property.value: You need 5 aditional power to win the game. Response: after you play a Wildling character from your hand, discard X power from each opponent's House. X is the number of doomed cards in your dead pile (limit once per round.)

property.name: Type
property.value: Agenda

property.name: Text
property.value: At the end of the dominance phase, each player must choose and discard all but 4 cards in his or her hand, if able

property.name: Type
property.value: Agenda

property.name: Text
property.value: You draw 1 fewer card during the draw phase. Response: after you draw cards during the draw phase, reveal the top X cards of your deck and put them into your hand. X is the number of doomed cards in your dead pile
